custom_body_class.comment: Add a custom class to body tag.

newsletter_popup.label: Newsletter Popup
newsletter_popup.comment: Don't select any block to disable popup

newsletter_popup_delay_time.label: Newsletter Popup Delay
newsletter_popup_delay_time.comment: Delay Time for Displaying Popup after Page Loaded (seconds)

disable_default_menu.label: Disable Default Menu
disable_default_menu.comment: If set "No", default menu of Magento is displayed instead of horizontal mega menu

vertical_menu.comment: Vertical menu is used or not depending theme style (displayed beside top slideshow or displayed when hovering menu title).

vertical_menu_title.label: Vertical Menu Title
vertical_menu_title.comment: Vertical menu is used or not depending theme style (displayed beside top slideshow or displayed when hovering menu title).

left_menu.label: Select Toggle Menu
left_menu.comment: Left menu is used or not depending theme style (displayed on toggle sidebar).

margin_right_desktop.label: Right Margin on Desktop

margin_bottom_desktop.comment: ( ↕ ) Vertical Space Between Two Product Items (px)

margin_right_mobile.label: Right Margin on Mobile
margin_right_mobile.comment: ( ↔ ) Horizontal Space Between Two Product Items (px)

margin_bottom_mobile.label: Bottom Margin on Mobile
margin_bottom_mobile.comment: ( ↕ ) Vertical Space Between Two Product Items (px)

google_api_key.label: Google API key
google_api_key.comment: Click HERE to get key. If this field is empty, Google Map feature won't work.

map_additional_markers.label: Additional Markers
map_additional_markers.comment:
Use syntax:
Title|Latitude|Longitude|Address
Breake line to add new marker.
Ex:
Store 2|45.5107660|-73.5108023|160 Chemin Tour-de-l’Isle Montreal, QC H3C 4G8
Store 3|45.710767|-73.7108656|2505 Boulevard des EntreprisesTerrebonne, QC J6X 5S5
